name: PeerMe MultiSig: Propose SC Deploy
title: Propose smart contract deployment
description: Create a proposal to deploy a new smart contract from source code using the MultiSig wallet. This allows the MultiSig to deploy contracts that require multiple approvals. The proposal requires quorum approval before execution.

inputs.name: EGLD Amount
inputs.description: The amount of EGLD to send with deployment (in wei, will be scaled by 18 decimals).

inputs.name: Source Address
inputs.description: The address of the source contract to deploy from.

messages.success: Proposal created successfully. Action ID: {{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}}. The smart contract deployment proposal is now awaiting signatures.

label.en: Get notified when this proposal is signed
label.de: Benachrichtigung erhalten, wenn dieser Vorschlag unterzeichnet wird

body.en: A board member has signed proposal #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} to deploy a smart contract
body.de: Ein Vorstandsmitglied hat Vorschlag #{{ACTION_ID_NUMBER}} zur Bereitstellung eines Smart Contracts unterzeichnet
